dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT location_name FROM location WHERE location_gid = :P_WAREHOUSE_GID
SELECT COUNT(*) total_out FROM glogowner.xxscou_release_sheet_mexico WHERE inbound_outbound = 'OUTBOUND' AND location_gid = :P_WAREHOUSE_GID
SELECT remark_text FROM location_remark WHERE location_gid = :P_WAREHOUSE_GID AND remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.ADDITIONAL NOTES'

SELECT nmc, TO_CHAR(start_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') start_date, start_date_ch, shipment, shipment_ch, (SELECT orr.order_release_xid FROM shipment sh, shipment_stop_d ssd, s_ship_unit ssu, s_ship_unit_line ssul, order_release orr WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND orr.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid AND sh.shipment_gid = glogowner.xxscou_release_sheet_mexico.shipment_gid AND ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = glogowner.xxscou_release_sheet_mexico.attribute1) ordrel, mode1, mode_ch, carrier, carrier_ch, customer, customer_ch, address, address_ch, so, so_ch, product, product_ch, TO_CHAR(quantity,'999,999,990') quantity, quantity_ch, uom, uom_ch, packaging_num, packaging_num_ch, packaging_uom, packaging_uom_ch, packaging_ltl, packaging_ltl_ch, (CASE WHEN (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = glogowner.xxscou_release_sheet_mexico.attribute1 AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT') IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN packaging_ltl = 'BULK' THEN '1' ELSE (CASE WHEN packaging_uom = 'KG' THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(((SELECT s.total_net_weight_base FROM shipment s WHERE s.shipment_gid = glogowner.xxscou_release_sheet_mexico.shipment_gid) / 2.2045855379) / TO_NUMBER(glogowner.xxscou_release_sheet_mexico.packaging_num),0))) END) END) ELSE (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = glogowner.xxscou_release_sheet_mexico.attribute1 AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT') END) bag_count, notes, notes_ch, inbound_outbound outbound FROM glogowner.xxscou_release_sheet_mexico WHERE inbound_outbound = 'OUTBOUND' AND location_gid = :P_WAREHOUSE_GID ORDER BY TO_DATE(start_date,'MM/DD/YYYY')
select trim(to_char(sysdate,'FMDay, Month DD, yyyy hh:mi AM')) CURR_DATE from dual
